channel.title: Pi 317 item equip help
channel.description:
i have all my items in item.cfg but when i try to equip an item like novite platebody its still in weapon slot.
item.cfg
item = 17239 Novite_platebody Provides_excellent_protection._(Tier_1) 0 0 0 0 0 0 -30 -10 20 19 11 -6 20 0 0
item.java
private static String[] fullbody = { "top", "chestplate", "Novite platebody", "Pernix body", "Virtus robe top", "Torva platebody", "shirt","platebody","Ahrims robetop", "Karils leathertop","brassard","Robe top","robetop", "platebody (t)","platebody (g)","chestplate", "torso", "hauberk", "Dragon chainbody" };
anything missing?

item.title: Pi 317 item equip help
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Added “Novite” at the end.

Read full topic

what did you change in that part?

“top”, “chestplate”, “Novite platebody”, “Pernix body”, “Virtus robe top”, “Torva platebody”, “shirt”,“platebody”,“Ahrims robetop”,

“platebody (t)”,“platebody (g)”,“chestplate”,
“torso”, “hauberk”, “Dragon chainbody”, “Novite”
};[/quote]

There. I think?

item.title: Pi 317 item equip help
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

i have all my items in item.cfg but when i try to equip an item like novite platebody its still in weapon slot.

item.cfg

item = 17239 Novite_platebody Provides_excellent_protection._(Tier_1) 0 0 0 0 0 0 -30 -10 20 19 11 -6 20 0 0

item.java

private static String[] fullbody = {
“top”, “chestplate”, “Novite platebody”, “Pernix body”, “Virtus robe top”, “Torva platebody”, “shirt”,“platebody”,“Ahrims robetop”,
“Karils leathertop”,“brassard”,“Robe top”,“robetop”,
“platebody (t)”,“platebody (g)”,“chestplate”,
“torso”, “hauberk”, “Dragon chainbody”
